name: Gibbering Mouther Platformer
description:
Go through the levels collecting orbs. when you have collected all orbs you can then leave the level and move on the the next one. 

Controls:

A/D : Moves Left/Right

W : Jump

E : Activate

F : Shoot (recharge metre is on the left)

T : Unlocks all levels (If you cant be bothered to progress) 

Credits

William Horton: Code, Level Design

Chris Broad: Background, Gathered Assets

Player Character

Arcane archer animated pixel character by AstroBob (itch.io)

Environment

Living Tissue Environment by ansimuz (itch.io)

Music
